jql: project = IT AND statusCategory != Done AND summary ~ "@{body('Parse_JSON_from_Sycope')?['name']}"@{if(not(empty(body('Parse_JSON_from_Sycope')?['clientIp']?['addressString'])), concat(' AND clientIp ~ "', body('Parse_JSON_from_Sycope')?['clientIp']?['addressString'], '"'), '')}@{if(not(empty(body('Parse_JSON_from_Sycope')?['serverIp']?['addressString'])), concat(' AND serverIp ~ "', body('Parse_JSON_from_Sycope')?['serverIp']?['addressString'], '"'), '')}
